title: Cooper says UK and allies ‘exposed barbaric Kremlin plot’ over Navalny’s death – UK politics live
summary_full: Foreign secretary interviewed on the morning shows after UK and other countries accused Kremlin over Putin critic’s deathPatrick Wintour is diplomatic editor for the GuardianThe intelligence agencies claimed laboratory testing found that the deadly toxin in the skin of Ecuador dart frogs (epibatidine) was found in samples from Navalny’s body and probably resulted in his death. Continue reading...
